name: Dreamy New Year 2014 at Mixin Mingle, Woodstock, IL
description:
Kick off the year of your dreams with fun, energy, and clarity! 

Would you like to begin the next wild and precious year of your life at a fun gathering of like-minded creative people?  Then this is just the workshop for you!

When: Saturday January 11, 2014 from 9-12

Where: Mixin Mingle on the historic and super-cute Woodstock, Illinois Square (124 Cass St. Woodstock, IL 60098; www.mixinmingle.com).

Investment: $35, with a bring-a-pal discount of $5 per friend (that includes you)! (Use discount code PAL2014 at checkout when registering yourself and a friend. Questions? Email Toni at makearoo dot com.)

Scoop: Led by Toni McLellan, a life coach and founder of Makearoo.com, we'll hang out, set a theme and create a vision for 2014, learn how to set meaningful goals we'll actually stick with, and share some handy tips on keeping momentum beyond January.

Perks: Emergency chocolate (of course!) and all the fun and laughter you can stand.

name: Dreamy New Year 2014 ONLINE Workshop
description:
Makearoo Dreamy New Year 2014: Kick off the year of your dreams with fun, energy, and clarity!

When: Sunday, January 5, 2014 from 9-12

Where: A Google+ Hangout; details to come after signup

Investment: $35, with a bring-a-pal discount of $5 per friend (that includes you)! Use discount code PAL2014 at checkout when registering yourself and a friend. Questions? Email Toni at makearoo dot com.

Scoop: Led by Toni McLellan, a life coach and founder of Makearoo.com, we'll hang out, set a theme and create a vision for 2014, learn how to set meaningful goals we'll actually stick with, and share some handy tips on keeping momentum beyond January.

There's only space for nine lucky weirdos, so grab your spot while we still have room! 

If there's enough demand, I'm happy to add another workshop date.
